title: AM Green Technology enters biofuels business
description: Hyderabad-based AM Green Technology and Solutions has signed a binding agreement to acquire Finland's Chempolis Oy and Fortum 3 B. entities, marking its entry into biofuels. The company plans to invest $1 billion over the next three years to produce sustainable aviation fuel for global airline decarbonisation. AM Green will also acquire Fortum's shares in Assam Bio Refinery in India.
